Moving gbradhopkins.com from ExpressionEngine to Jekyll

Sep 29, 2016 â€¢ Brad Hopkins

Looking for something with a bit less overhead and an opportunity to play around with Git and Jekyll, I have decided to move my site from ExpressionEngine - which I love - to Jekyll.

Links of note

  • Git Reference Guide - Basics of commiting and pushing content.
  • Jekyll Links and Resources - A list of resources that I pulled together for a talk that I gave back in 2015.
